General.Name: P.C.S. Machine Group Holding Public Company Limited
General.Description: P.C.S. Machine Group Holding Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes automotive parts in Asia, Europe, and internationally. It provides engine parts; transmission parts; final drives; and other parts comprising steering knuckle and engine mounting bracket. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Nakhon Ratchasima, Thailand.
General.Address: 2/1-9 Moo 3 Mittraparp Road, Nakhon Ratchasima, Thailand, 30280
